lead_paragraph: Even after Alex Ovechkin bailed the Washington Capitals out of trouble to win their fourth game in a row, all he wanted to talk about was how it almost slipped away.

headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Scores Twice, Including OT Winner as Caps Beat Jets
headline.main: Ovechkin Scores Twice, Including OT Winner as Caps Beat Jets

snippet: Even after Alex Ovechkin bailed the Washington Capitals out of trouble to win their fourth game in a row, all he wanted to talk about was how it almost slipped away....
